Okay. Here's the thing. I've read through the comments of other viewers --- some trashing the film and some saying it's the funniest, most enjoyable work of kung-fu ever made. This movie is biggest of all foibles. It's the average. The premise is contrived: A bartender, who thinks he's a policeman, who can fight but, inexplicably can't shoot, acquires a robot assistant. Hilarity ensues.

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, whom Alice has named Granger , comes from an ancient family of witches ; he is actually the cat form of Mason .
